replies.bodyText:
these values are having a bit different meaning, generally we have two points of wait

message is sent from external service to recipient
java client observes new message arrives to recipient
So the waitMode is responsible for sending sync signal for new messages, while messageEventWaitDuration is responsible for getting new messages due to that signal
I think this values should be lower than polling time and probably it makes sense to hardcode it
replies.author: uarlouski
